#summary Before you install Icebreaker, you must first install TurboGears.

= Introduction =

TurboGears is the framework Icebreaker is based on


= Details =

If you already have Python installed, there are only 2 steps to install TurboGears:

   1. Download the [http://www.turbogears.org/download/tgsetup.py tgsetup.py] script.
   2. Run tgsetup.py on Windows, or run python tgsetup.py on Unix or Mac


Additional information is available [http://www.turbogears.org/download/ here].
